name: Why Mac OS is inferior to Windows
content: Look, hear me out. I know this is generally an unpopular opinion, and by most technical definitions, I'm just... wrong, but I dunno. Mac OS looks like it never grew out of trying to look sleek and trendy, like, 10 years ago. Plus, fuck Apple's ultra-capitalist minimalist design. I watched some Apple tech plug 4 adapters into the side of a Macbook just to charge an iPad. Also, fuck Steve Jobs.

name: Ed Snowden Did Nothing Wrong
content: That's all there is to it. If you think he's a traitor, you should probably stop eating US propaganda.

name: Why RegEx is dope
content: Writing Regular Expressions is real neato, dude. It's like putting together puzzle pieces. And then having your puzzle pieces read for you. It's cool. That's all I have to say on the matter.

name: First Post!
content: I just found this new tech blog app. Pretty alright, I guess. Anyway, that's all.

name: Rocks
content: I don't know much about tech, but I sure do like rocks. The pretty colorful ones.

name: stop charging so much.
content: Imagine if people sold tech like Fugazi sold concert tickets. $5, for anyone. I don't know how that has anything to do with tech, but here I am.

name: Handlebars!
content: Handlebars is my favorite templating engine. It's just so good. Sooooooo good. So useful.
